title: Loukou
description: A villa of Roman Imperial date, attributed to Herodes Atticus and his heirs. The modern name comes from the nearby Moni Loukous, or monastery of Loukou (St. Luke?), which may sit above an early Christian church.

properties.description: Remains of a villa of Roman Imperial date, attributed to Herodes Atticus (2nd c. CE), with occupation attested at least through the 5th c. CE.
properties.title: Imagery location of Villa of Herodes Atticus

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 13529
